result_description.last_approved_text: A near thing, but the enemy's superior tactics have brought low your army.

battle_result_types.result_description: A near thing, but the enemy's superior tactics have brought low your army.

result_description.last_approved_text: You have won the battle. But do not celebrate too much, for the gods will look ill upon he who came so near to defeat.

battle_result_types.result_description: You have won the battle. But do not celebrate too much, for the gods will look ill upon he who came so near to defeat.

result_description.last_approved_text: The perfidious foe mocks you! Go and suffer in the ignominy of defeat, but don't linger, for the enemy is coming to finish the job.

battle_result_types.result_description: The perfidious foe mocks you! Go and suffer in the ignominy of defeat, but don't linger, for the enemy is coming to finish the job.

result_description.last_approved_text: You have been roundly beaten. Carrion-eaters already pick at your fallen; their shame is on you.

battle_result_types.result_description: You have been roundly beaten. Carrion-eaters already pick at your fallen; their shame is on you.

result_description.last_approved_text: You are victorious! The corpses of the enemy litter the ground and those still able to flee do so with the laughter of our gods ringing in their ears!

battle_result_types.result_description: You are victorious! The corpses of the enemy litter the ground and those still able to flee do so with the laughter of our gods ringing in their ears!

result_description.last_approved_text: The only winner here is the Blood God.

battle_result_types.result_description: The only winner here is the Blood God.

result_description.last_approved_text: Victory is yours! Revel in your might and bask in fleeting glory. The enemy will remember this defeat, scorched into their racial memory 'til the End Times and beyond.

battle_result_types.result_description: Victory is yours! Revel in your might and bask in fleeting glory. The enemy will remember this defeat, scorched into their racial memory 'til the End Times and beyond.

result_description.last_approved_text: The enemy has cost you dearly. Do you even deserve to call it a victory?

battle_result_types.result_description: The enemy has cost you dearly. Do you even deserve to call it a victory?

result_description.last_approved_text: You have lost, but there is honour in this defeat… the enemy is as broken as you.

battle_result_types.result_description: You have lost, but there is honour in this defeat… the enemy is as broken as you.
